TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SystemInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供目前系統環境的相關資訊。

span.span: Provides information about the current system environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供`static`可用來取得目前的系統環境的相關資訊的屬性。The class provides `static` properties that can be used to get information about the current system environment. 類別會提供資訊的存取權，例如 Windows 顯示項目大小、 作業系統設定、 網路可用性和硬體系統上安裝的功能。The class provides access to information such as Windows display element sizes, operating system settings, network availability, and the capabilities of hardware installed on the system. 無法執行個體化這個類別。This class cannot be instantiated. 多個全系統參數的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 SystemParametersInfo 」，在 Platform SDK 文件，網址[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com)。For more information about system-wide parameters, see "SystemParametersInfo" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出的所有屬性類別內，並顯示在屬性的目前值時選取的項目清單。The following code example lists all properties of the class in a and displays the current value of the property in a when a list item selected. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會擷取本機電腦的 NetBIOS 名稱。The property retrieves the NetBIOS name of the local computer. 這是以原生的系統資訊函式 GetComputerName 呼叫中完成。This is accomplished with a call into the native System Information function GetComputerName. 當系統從登錄讀取，則會在系統啟動時，建立此名稱。This name is established at system startup, when the system reads it from the registry. 如果本機電腦是叢集中的節點傳回叢集虛擬伺服器的名稱。If the local computer is a node in a cluster, returns the name of the cluster virtual server. 您可以使用方法，以判斷顯示網路上其他使用者的電腦名稱。You can use the method to determine the name of the computer that is displayed to other users on a network. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出的所有屬性類別內，並顯示在屬性的目前值時選取的項目清單。The following code example lists all properties of the class in a and displays the current value of the property in a when a list item selected. Windows 會使用矩形做為在其中沒有啟動拖曳作業的界限。Windows uses the rectangle as a boundary within which it does not start a drag operation. 使用者可以按住滑鼠按鈕，並在此區域內移動滑鼠，在拖曳作業開始之前，可讓使用者按一下，並輕鬆地放開滑鼠按鈕，但不會不小心啟動拖曳作業。A user can hold a mouse button down and move the mouse within this area before a drag operation begins, which enables the user to click and release the mouse button easily without unintentionally starting a drag operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出的所有屬性類別內，並顯示在屬性的目前值時選取的項目清單。The following code example lists all properties of the class in a and displays the current value of the property in a when a list item selected. summary.span: 取得值，表示是否已啟用使用者介面 (UI)。

value.span: 如果已啟用 UI 效果，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if UI effects are enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 效果包括漸淡動畫、 熱追蹤，以及 smooth 系統控制項的捲動和繪製滑鼠游標下的陰影。UI effects include animation, fading, hot tracking, and smooth scrolling of system controls, and drawing a shadow under the mouse cursor. UI 效果會停用時，會停用這些功能。When UI effects are disabled, these features are disabled. 當啟用 UI 效果時，會啟用只設定為使用目前使用者的影響。When UI effects are enabled, only the effects configured as active for the current user are enabled. 下表列出屬性，指出是否啟用特定的 UI 效果，如果這個屬性的值為`true`:The following table lists properties that indicate whether particular UI effects are enabled, if the value of this property is `true`: |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||指出是否已啟用下拉式方塊的滑動開啟效果。Indicates whether the slide-open effect for combo boxes is enabled.| ||表示視窗標題列的漸層效果是否已啟用。Indicates whether the gradient effect for window title bars is enabled.| ||指出是否已啟用熱追蹤使用者介面項目，例如，功能表列上的功能表名稱。Indicates whether hot tracking of user-interface elements, such as menu names on menu bars, is enabled.| ||指出清單方塊的平滑捲動效果是否已啟用。Indicates whether the smooth-scrolling effect for list boxes is enabled.| ||表示已啟用功能表淡出或滑動動畫功能。Indicates whether menu fade or slide animation features are enabled.| ||指出是否功能表便捷鍵一律加上底線。Indicates whether menu access keys are always underlined.| ||指出是否已啟用選取淡出效果。Indicates whether the selection fade effect is enabled.| ||指出是否已啟用工具提示動畫。Indicates whether ToolTip animation is enabled.| > [!NOTE] > 只能在 Windows 2000，Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上才支援這個屬性。This property is supported only on Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family. 在其他平台，這個屬性會傳回`false`。On other platforms, this property returns `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出的所有屬性類別內，並顯示在屬性的目前值時選取的項目清單。The following code example lists all properties of the class in a and displays the current value of the property in a when a list item selected. summary.span: 取得虛擬螢幕的界限。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出在多監視器系統上的整個桌面界限。The property indicates the bounds of the entire desktop on a multi-monitor system. 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷已安裝的多個監視器的系統上可用的最大視覺空間。You can use this property to determine the maximum visual space available on a system that has multiple monitors installed. 矩形的位置座標表示的位置位移，單位為像素虛擬螢幕區域，相對於主要顯示螢幕上區域的左上角的左上角。The position coordinates of the rectangle indicate the position offset, in pixels, of the upper left corner of the virtual screen area relative to the upper left corner of the onscreen area of the primary display. 矩形的大小值會指出虛擬螢幕區域的大小。The size values of the rectangle indicate the size of the virtual screen area. > [!NOTE] > 虛擬螢幕左邊的主顯示器的左邊緣開始時，矩形的位置座標是負數。The position coordinate of the rectangle is negative when the virtual screen starts to the left of the left edge of the primary display. 虛擬螢幕啟動主顯示器上的邊緣上方時，矩形的座標為負數。The coordinate of the rectangle is negative when the virtual screen starts above the top edge of the primary display. > [!NOTE] > 只能在 Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000，Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上才支援這個屬性。This property is supported only on Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出的所有屬性類別內，並顯示在屬性的目前值時選取的項目清單。The following code example lists all properties of the class in a and displays the current value of the property in a when a list item selected. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出應用程式可以使用在螢幕的界限。The property indicates the bounds of the screen that can be used by applications. 工作區域是指顯示的桌面區域，不包括工具列、停駐視窗和停駐工具列。The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars. 一律會傳回之工作區的主要監視器。 always returns the work area of the primary monitor. 如果您需要之工作區的多重顯示環境中的監視，您可以呼叫其中一個多載。If you need the work area of a monitor in a multiple display environment, you can call one of the overloads of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出的所有屬性類別內，並顯示在屬性的目前值時選取的項目清單。The following code example lists all properties of the class in a and displays the current value of the property in a when a list item selected.
